meanings.definition: A railing designed to be grasped by the hand for support or guidance.
meanings.sent1: The handrailings along the staircase helped me keep my balance.
meanings.sent2: Please hold onto the handrailings while walking down the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The handrailings giggled as they felt the touch of every passing hand.
meanings.sent4: The handrailings of life may guide us through uncertain times.
meanings.sent5: The shiny handrailings gleamed under the bright lights of the hallway.

meanings.definition: The act of installing or providing handrails.
meanings.sent1: Proper handrailings ensure safety on the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The handrailings of the building were installed last week.
meanings.sent3: The handrailings threw a party to celebrate their installation.
meanings.sent4: The handrailings of progress lead us towards accessibility.
meanings.sent5: The workers finished the handrailings with precision and care.

meanings.definition: The material used to construct handrails.
meanings.sent1: Wood is a common material for handrailings.
meanings.sent2: The metal handrailings were sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The handrailings whispered secrets of their construction.
meanings.sent4: The glass handrailings added a modern touch to the design.
meanings.sent5: The handrailings made of marble exuded elegance and luxury.
